topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack 1.1: Making an Image Public

body.p: When you create an image or an image snapshot, as an admin, you can determine if the snapshot is available only in the current project or to all projects in the domain.

section.title: Make an image public

li.p: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Helion Dashboard.
Click the Images link on the Project dashboard Compute panel.
In the Images screen, for the image you want to protect, click More > Edit.

ol.li: In the Update Image screen, select Public.

section.p: The image is public and available to all projects in the domain.
